document.full_text: amazon.com inc is thinking long-term when it spends heavily on "the cloud," but investors may see a little more short-term rain when the online retailer reports its earnings on tuesday.
document.title: amazon betting on cloud computing, sacrificing some profit
lines_and_colors: amazon.com inc is thinking long-term when it spends heavily on "the cloud," but investors may see a little more short-term rain when the online retailer reports its earnings on tuesday.
